title: A Time to Kill, a Time to Heal: Technology through a biblical lens
abstract: Western societies expect technological solutions for increasingly difficult and expansive problems. Some of the problems arise from natural causes, but others are consequences of technology itself; and solutions can create ethical dilemmas as complex as the problems we are attempting to resolve. Some malevolent applications may be averted; but unintended consequences may not be recognized …
shortTitle: A Time to Kill, a Time to Heal
